name: Nox (itch) (kentoshin)
description:
A 2D puzzle platformer where you play as a cat exploring its dreams and nightmares!

Controls:

  • Movement: WASD
  • Jump: Space
  • Pounce (high jump): Hold shift to charge and space to jump
  • Change Worlds: Enter

A game by Yes And Studios

  • Brandan Chen - Production, Sound & Music
  • Ken Zheng - Programming
  • Josh Huang - Programming
  • Chelsea Liu - Art & UI
  • Shelly Zhang - Art & Animation

Hints:

  • You can push the flower pot
  • To perform the high jump, you need to hold shift for 0.5s to charge it before jumping
